name: supernatural castle destroyer
description:
The main purpose of this game is to destroy the enemy castle with your supernatural cannon (adjust the following settings by pressing the indicated keys):

Game speed
F = super slow-motion
G = slow-motion
H = normal

Camera
C = focus on cannon only
V = focus on cannon, switching to cannon ball when shooting

World gravity
7 = very low
8 = low
9 = normal

Cannon power
I = normal
O = high
P = very high

Cannon ball size
J = normal
K = large
L = very large

Cannon ball weight
B = normal
N = heavy
M = super heavy

Game
R = Restart
Q = Quit

Have fun! :-)

Other projects (in development)
